title: looks similar to herculanum, but...
content:
I thought I knew what this was, but I was wrong. Any ideas?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022094629im_/http:/typophile.com/files/confreau_6592.gif)
author: russ_mcmullin

comments.content: Also similar (and arguably better) is [Rusticana](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022094629/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/linotype/rusticana_lt_std_roman_ot/), [Mission](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022094629/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/creative_alliance/mission/), [Cadmus](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022094629/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/rimmer/rtf_cadmus_regular/) and [Numa](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022094629/http:/www.stonetypefoundry.com/numaoverview.html).
